img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game set in a snowy landscape. A character wearing a cloak and holding a staff is walking through the snow. In the distance, there is an enemy with a red health bar standing on a rock. A red dashed circle highlights a particular object or location in the snow. The game's interface shows various icons on the bottom left corner, possibly representing abilities or items, and a status bar with three segments. On the right side, there is a notification indicating a gain of "+4 Will" with a count of "x9."
